page.title: 17CHASE FARM HOSPITAL
page.content: The original building was erected in 1884 as an orphanage.It only became a hospital during the First World War. It is part of Enfield District Health Authority, which also includes High- lands Hospital, St. Michaels Hospital and Cheshunt Cottage Hospital.It serves the London Borough of Enfield, population 261,100.Cheshunt is included for mental illness purposes only.The hospital has Surgical, Medical, Orthopaedic and Gynaecolog- ical Wards.There is an Out-patient Dept for all specialities;Accident and Emergency Dept; and Dept of Psychiatry Supporting Depts include Physiotherapy Occupational Therapy, Speech Therapy, E.C.G., Dietics, Social Work, Laboratories, Mortuary, Psychology, X-Ray, Medical Photography as well as kitchens, Domestic and Portering Depts Stores, Theatre Sterile Supply Unit,
